DBO.name: pbs_CLIENT_DOC
DBO.Install: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id=OBJECT_ID(N'dbo.[pbs_CLIENT_DOC]')) BEGIN CREATE TABLE [dbo].[pbs_CLIENT_DOC]( [LINE_NO] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [SUBMIT_TIME] [datetime] NOT NULL, [WORK_STATION] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL, [USER_ID] [varchar](50) NOT NULL, [LOCAL_DOC_URL] [varchar](350) NOT NULL, [CLOUND_DOC_URL] [varchar](350) NOT NULL, [PROCESSING_STATUS] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [REFERENCE] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [DESCRIPTION] [nvarchar](250) NOT NULL, [CLIENT_CODE] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [EMP_CODE] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [PROJECT_CODE] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [DOC_TYPE] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [DOC_DATE] [int] NOT NULL, [CONTRACT_CODE] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [UPDATED] [int] NOT NULL, [UPDATED_BY] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_pbs_CLIENT_DOC] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [LINE_NO] ASC ) ) END

DBO.name: pbs_CLIENT_DOC_Insert
pbs_CLIENT_DOC_Update
pbs_DOC_PROCESS
DBO.Install: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id=OBJECT_ID(N'dbo.[pbs_DOC_PROCESS]')) BEGIN CREATE TABLE [dbo].[pbs_DOC_PROCESS]( [LINE_NO] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [CLIENT_DOC_ID] [int] NOT NULL, [PROCESSING_DATE] [datetime] NOT NULL, [PROCESSING_OPERATION] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [PROCESSING_BY] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL, [STATUS] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [COMMENT] [nvarchar](1000) NOT NULL, [UPDATED] [datetime] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_pbs_DOC_PROCESS] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [LINE_NO] ASC ) ) END

DBO.name: pbs_DOC_PROCESS_Insert
pbs_DOC_PROCESS_Update
